# puller

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-yellow.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html)
<!-- badges: end -->

(WIP) A package to help data scientists get data from Azure reproducibly.

## Installation

You can install the development version of puller from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("alexkyllo/puller")
```
